content:
We have a few bug fixes, new ANSI color output support, std stream output cleanup in master. I opened a PR last night to reformat the final report that is pushed to rust-lang/rust threads. This addresses a conversation that @simulacrum and I had a couple of weeks ago. The PR removes some of the Markdown formatting that users don't push into the threads and adds additional bisect-rustc data to identify the version that was used, the host triple, and the args to reproduce the bisection. I suggest that we push a new release once that PR is reviewed and a decision is made about whether to merge it.

cc @bjorn3
